TextBlock.Text: COLEUS: What a relief! The <color=orange>frozen specimen</color> transported from Bramble Island appears to be thriving in its new habitat.

MELORAE: Though we made many discoveries there, I am thankful to never have to return to our <color=orange>old research site on Bramble Island..</color> not after discovering the island's fondness for <color=orange>capsizing!</color>

PLUME: My gratitude for all your hard work, my friends. Now, with the assistance of this new specimen, we should be better equipped than ever to pinpoint the cause of the <color=orange>surfacing phenomenon!</color>

PHLOX: I heard the shuttle leave! Did papa go somewhere again? I was waiting for him to come back to present my <color=orange>report assignment</color> to him! I even painted murals for my presentation..
PLUME: My deepest apologies, Phlox! I shall come at once to learn the fruits of your hard work and research at last!

PLUME: Friends, should you wish to listen to <color=orange>Phlox's report,</color> I humbly invite you to join us within the <color=orange>Garden Chamber!</color> I believe my son's hard work to be highly worthy of an audience!
